metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40307 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.19.8.drivers/firmware/efi/capsule-loader.c has a race condition with a resultantuse-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
